Text:
One question:  Does this version include the Tangerine Dream soundtrack, or the original soundtrack by Jerry Goldsmith.

(I'm seeking the version with the Tangerine Dream soundtrack--it is the soundtrack used in the original [VHS] U.S. version.)

FFS this is the poxy directors cut. Why they screwed with the score to this film no one'll ever know. The poxy director wont know either as he was clearly high on drugs at the sodding time.
v:8
A:9
this is NOT the tangerine dream soundtrack version!
